page.title: 16Industry Textile Factories
page.content: In Great Cornard there are 2 textile factories,Stephen Walters and Guilford Kapwood. Stephen Walters are situated along Cornard Road and they have quite a big area of land.This factory makes silk and fabric for ties,wedding dresses and high quality garments.They are famous because they made the under silk for Princess Diana's wedding dress in the Royal Wedding. Guilford Kapwood produce warp fabrics for the mass market.The yarn is bought on bobbins.The bobbins are set up on a creet and warped onto sections which are put onto knitting machines.The knitted fabric used to go through the dying and finishing process and then sent to its customers but now it is done in Nottingham.The fabric is used for shirts,dresses,sheets,track suits and car covers.
